attributes.action: Overhaul rules regarding VAT exemption to all DLA / PIP claimants .
attributes.background: Only permanent wheelchair users are VAT exempt on disability aids etc , should be all DLA/ PIP claimants

rejection.details:
VAT relief is available to anyone who is disabled or has a long-term illness, for products designed or adapted for their own personal or domestic use.

For VAT purposes, a person is disabled or have a long-term illness if:

- they have a physical or mental impairment that affects your ability to carry out everyday activities, for example blindness
- they have a condition that’s treated as chronic sickness, like diabetes
- they're terminally ill

You can find out more about VAT relief for disabled people here: https://www.gov.uk/financial-help-disabled/vat-relief
